message.body: Gabi, what's your status this semester? Studying with me? Do you have any open slots on wed? Let me know....
Hey Kevin, yep. I'm free anytime before 3 on Wednesdays
Cool, probably do a 1 pm lesson with you this semester...I have to meet with Bruce at 12...except for tomorrow! Can we meet at 2 tomorrow?
Sure, see you then. Do we have a room for this semester?
What, you don't like being bass nomads?
